mapper.select: SELECT a.server_id as server_id, a.init_tm as init_tm, a.cpu_per as cpu_per, a.mem_per as mem_per, a.disk_per as disk_per, a.temp_val as temp_val, a.net_per as net_per, a.risk_check as risk_check, a.risk_result as risk_result, wsb.boot as boot, wsi.server_nm as server_nm, wsi.server_ord as server_ord, wsi.st_cpu_per as st_cpu_per, wsi.st_mem_per as st_mem_per, wsi.st_disk_per as st_disk_per, wsi.st_temp_val as st_temp_val, wsi.st_net_per as st_net_per FROM (SELECT wsi.server_id, wsd.init_tm, COALESCE(wsd.cpu_per, 'not_connection') AS cpu_per, COALESCE(wsd.mem_per, 'not_connection') AS mem_per, COALESCE(wsd.disk_per, 'not_connection') AS disk_per, COALESCE(wsd.temp_val, 'not_connection') AS temp_val, COALESCE(wsd.net_per, 'not_connection') AS net_per, COALESCE(wsd.risk_check, 'not_connection') AS risk_check, COALESCE(wsd.risk_result, 'not_connection') AS risk_result FROM wms.whms_server_info wsi LEFT JOIN (SELECT server_id, MAX(init_tm) AS max_init_tm FROM wms.whms_server_data WHERE init_tm BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{currentDateFormat}, INTERVAL 1 HOUR), '%Y%m%d%H%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{currentDateFormat}, '%Y%m%d%H%i') GROUP BY server_id) x ON wsi.server_id = x.server_id LEFT JOIN wms.whms_server_data wsd ON wsd.server_id = x.server_id AND wsd.init_tm = x.max_init_tm WHERE wsi.server_id != '6') a JOIN wms.whms_server_info wsi ON a.server_id = wsi.server_id LEFT JOIN wms.whms_server_boot wsb ON a.server_id = wsb.server_id AND LEFT(a.init_tm, 8) = wsb.init_tm

SELECT sub.server_id, sub.net_per, sub.server_nm, sub.server_ord, sub.init_tm, sub.st_net_per, sub.date FROM ( SELECT wsd.server_id as server_id, wsd.net_per as net_per, wsi.server_nm as server_nm, wsi.server_ord as server_ord, wsd.init_tm as init_tm, wsi.st_net_per as st_net_per, DATE(CAST(CONCAT( SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 1, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 5, 2), '-', SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 7, 2) ) AS DATE)) AS date FROM whms_server_data wsd JOIN whms_server_info wsi on wsd.server_id = wsi.server_id WHERE wsd.server_id = #{server_id} AND wsd.server_id != '6' ORDER BY wsd.init_tm DESC LIMIT 60 ) sub ORDER BY sub.init_tm asc

SELECT z.server_id as server_id, z.server_nm as server_nm, z.dt as date, wsr.init_tm as init_tm, COALESCE(wsr.cpu_per, null) as cpu_per, COALESCE(wsr.mem_per, null) as mem_per, COALESCE(wsr.disk_per, null) as disk_per, COALESCE(wsr.temp_val, null) as temp_val, COALESCE(wsr.net_per, null) as net_per FROM (SELECT x.server_id, x.server_nm, y.dt FROM whms_server_info x CROSS JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(LEFT(#{currentDateFormat},10), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AS dt )y )z LEFT JOIN whms_server_rank wsr ON z.server_id = wsr.server_id AND z.dt = wsr.init_tm WHERE z.server_id != '6' GROUP BY z.server_id ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{chartType} = 'temp_val' THEN CAST(wsr.temp_val AS FLOAT) WHEN #{chartType} = 'cpu_per' THEN CAST(wsr.cpu_per AS FLOAT) WHEN #{chartType} = 'mem_per' THEN CAST(wsr.mem_per AS FLOAT) WHEN #{chartType} = 'disk_per' THEN CAST(wsr.disk_per AS FLOAT) ELSE 0 END DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT z.server_id as server_id, z.server_nm as server_nm, LEFT(z.dt, 8) as date, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN wsd.risk_check = 1 and wsd.msg != '0_0_0_0_1' THEN 1 WHEN wsd.risk_check = 0 THEN 0 END), null) AS risk_checkCount FROM (SELECT x.server_id, x.server_nm, y.dt FROM whms_server_info x CROSS JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(#{currentDateFormat}, INTERVAL #{riskCheckDay} DAY), INTERVAL (a + (b * 10) + (c * 100) + (d * 1000) + (e * 10000)) MINUTE), '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS dt FROM (SELECT 0 a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) t1, (SELECT 0 b UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) t2, (SELECT 0 c UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) t3, (SELECT 0 d UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) t4, (SELECT 0 e UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) t5 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(#{currentDateFormat}, INTERVAL #{riskCheckDay} DAY), INTERVAL (a + (b * 10) + (c * 100) + (d * 1000) + (e * 10000)) MINUTE), '%Y%m%d%H%i') <= #{endDateFormat} ORDER BY dt) y ) z LEFT JOIN whms_server_data wsd ON z.server_id = wsd.server_id AND z.dt = wsd.init_tm WHERE z.server_id != '6' GROUP BY server_id, date

SELECT wsd.server_id as server_id, wsd.init_tm as init_tm, wsd.cpu_per as cpu_per, wsd.mem_per as mem_per, wsd.disk_per as disk_per, wsd.temp_val as temp_val, wsd.net_per as net_per, wsd.risk_check AS risk_check, wsd.risk_result AS risk_result, CASE WHEN ( CASE WHEN RIGHT(wsd.msg, 2) = '_1' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(wsd.msg, 1, CHAR_LENGTH(wsd.msg) - 1), '0') ELSE wsd.msg END) = '0_0_0_0_0' THEN NULL ELSE ( CASE WHEN RIGHT(wsd.msg, 2) = '_1' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(wsd.msg, 1, CHAR_LENGTH(wsd.msg) - 1), '0') ELSE wsd.msg END) END AS msg, wsi.server_nm as server_nm, wsi.server_ord as server_ord, CAST(CONCAT( SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 1, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 5, 2), '-', SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 7, 2), ' ', SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 9, 2), ':', SUBSTRING(wsd.init_tm, 11, 2) ) AS DATETIME) AS date, (select count(*) from whms_server_data wsd where wsd.risk_check = 1 AND wsd.msg != '0_0_0_0_1') as risk_check_count, (select count(*) from whms_server_data wsd where wsd.risk_result = 1 AND wsd.msg != '0_0_0_0_1') as risk_result_count, wsi.server_nm as server_nm, wsi.server_ord as server_ord, wsi.st_cpu_per as st_cpu_per, wsi.st_mem_per as st_mem_per, wsi.st_disk_per as st_disk_per, wsi.st_temp_val as st_temp_val, wsi.st_net_per as st_net_per FROM whms_server_data wsd JOIN whms_server_info wsi on wsd.server_id = wsi.server_id WHERE risk_check =1 AND wsd.server_id != '6' AND msg != '0_0_0_0_1' AND STR_TO_DATE(wsd.init_tm, '%Y%m%d%H%i') <= DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(#{currentDateFormat}, '%Y%m%d%H%i'), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) ORDER BY init_tm ${riskStateOrder}, server_id asc
mapper.update: UPDATE whms_server_data SET risk_result = '0' WHERE server_id = #{server_id} AND init_tm = #{init_tm} AND risk_result = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT user_label AS "userLabel", user_name AS "userName", started_at AS "startedAt", ended_at AS "endedAt", status AS "status", host_name AS "hostName", created_at AS "createdAt", updated_at AS "updated_at" FROM wms.wms_remote_sessions wrs ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 1
